links.to_node: stop to help and be late for work
I will be late for my first day of work, potentially upsetting my boss and creating a negative first impression.
The person who crashed may be injured and in need of assistance, and I may be able to provide help and support.
By stopping to help, I may demonstrate compassion and empathy, potentially earning goodwill from the person I assist and others who witness the event.
My decision to stop and help may lead to a positive impact on the injured person's well-being and potentially even save their life.
There is a possibility that my boss may understand and appreciate my willingness to help someone in need, leading to a positive impression despite being late.
On the other hand, my boss may be strictly focused on punctuality and may reprimand me for being late, potentially leading to a strained relationship from the beginning.
